body.p: Direct connections represent the relationship between different hardware connected physically or virtually. For each object type connected, the name, serial number, inventory number are listed. A link allows to indicate to GLPI that this object should no longer be marked as connected to the computer.
Example : Connecting a computer with a printer (network or not), a monitor, a device or an external phone.
Connections or disconnections are made from the details of all related materials or from the massive update system.
